subject: Football
Decisions and Verdicts
Lockouts
Appeals Courts (US)
Suits and Litigation
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. and players continue to wait for the Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit to rule on the league’s request for a full stay through the appeal of an injunction.
snippet: The N.F.L. and players continue to wait for the Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit to rule on the league’s request for a full stay through the appeal of an injunction.
